page.title: 15A Bwlch-y-groes yard game
page.content: One of the games we play on the school yard is called "horses".To play the game you will need some skipping ropes.Any number of children can play.Some of the children have to be owners.The owners have two horses each.Their names are usually Black Beauty,Brandy,Victoria,Twinkletoes, Sugar or Flicker.The children who are left out are the horses.The horses' reins are the skipping ropes which go around the horses' waists while the owners hold on to the ends.To start the horses,the owners whip the reins and shout something like "yahoo".The owners run their horses in races against each other.When the bell rings for the end of playtime, the horses are turned out into their paddock,which are the school fields.This is a game we really enjoy.
